works.title: Works
works.projects: My projects using, HTML, CSS, Javascript and React

about.description: Self-taught Front-end Development with knowledge in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React and Git. My completed projects consist of (a) To Do App list; (b) Application time; (c) Book Contact; (d) Landing page; (e) Slide puzzle game; (f) Calculator JS; (g) Click counter (React) and (h)Testimonials FCC (React) These are on Github and Freecodecamp.com,
about.medios: YouTube, Stackoverflow, and the MDN documentation. They have been my main source of learning.
about.near: In the near future I would like to perfect my knowledge in React and Js, also in a medium-term future, I would like to learn other languages such as nodeJS or python.
